questions.question: Which of the following is in echelon form?

explanations.a: The first non zero element in each row is 1
explanations.b: First non zero entry in each row is not 1
explanations.c: Rows with all zero elements , if any are below the rows having a non-zero element
explanations.d: First non zero entry in each row is not 1
